original_title: El cielo y la tierra son tan viejos como yo y las 10 mil cosas son una
overview: Two young men travel the city of Santiago during a working day in order to carry out a bureaucratic process. In their journey, they run into different urban characters as they talk about time and other "important" issues.
title: El cielo y la tierra son tan viejos como yo y las 10 mil cosas son una
